overview.name: Overview
overview.text: Get an inside look at SAP Integrated Business Planning — the cornerstone of a risk-resilient supply chain. Click through our product tour, explore key features, and learn how they help you optimize planning across different scenarios.
overview.imgAltText: Screenshot of intelligent visibility dashboard down to the sales order level
overview.bottomText: Take the next step and learn how the product can meet your business needs.
overview.finalSlideTitle: Ready to take the next step?

tours.name: Supply chain visibility and risk management

steps.text: Get an overview of critical risks in your supply chain network and work on them instantly.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard landing page for supply chain risk analysis

steps.text: Use analytics stories in SAP IBP to smartly analyze performance data, KPIs, and risks.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for supply chain risk analysis

steps.text: Apply geo mapping technology to keep relevant supply chain network data, key KPIs, and priority alerts at your fingertips.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of geo mapping capabilities

steps.text: Enable exception-based supply chain planning using procedure playbooks for prioritized alerting and guided resolutions.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of supply chain risk management information

steps.text: Analyze and manage your carbon footprint throughout your supply chain network.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for managing carbon footprint

tours.name: Sales and operations planning (S&OP) to sales and operations execution (S&OE)

steps.text: Define and manage the recurring S&OP planning cycle.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of the S&OP monthly process

steps.text: Coordinate demand planning activities to establish consensus demand.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of S&OP process for establishing consensus demand

steps.text: Generate a rough-cut supply plan by identifying constraints.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of capacity constraints

steps.text: Prepare and conduct management review meetings.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for management review

steps.text: Classify and analyze demand patterns in your historical data to help guide forecasting and algorithm selection.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard with time-series analysis output

steps.text: Generate a forecast and analyze drivers to understand what drives forecast deviation.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of variable impact analysis and forecast dashboard

steps.text: Manually adjust forecasts based on information and insights not included in the mathematical model.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of planner workspace with grid for manual forecast adjustments

steps.text: Analyze forecast errors and bias using stories to both monitor the demand planning process and focus on areas in need of improvement.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for analyzing forecast errors and bias

steps.text: Review inputs to evaluate model setup.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of inventory planning inputs

steps.text: Perform optimizations and run and review outputs.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for inventory optimization

steps.text: Evaluate the drivers of inventory levels and identify the factors influencing the stock target.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for inventory planning

steps.text: Apply scenario planning to examine the effect of different inputs.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for scenario planning

steps.text: Analyze the financial impact of inventory plans.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of dashboard for analyzing financial impact of plans

steps.text: Perform supply planning runs, then review the rough-cut capacity plan in bucketed periods. Quickly identify periods of capacity overages and determine corrective options.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of data for analyzing capacity overages

steps.text: Send supply plans for components to suppliers and incorporate their updates to further constrain the plan. Any resulting shortages will trigger an alert, and planners can investigate alternative options.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of analysis of supplier commit shortages

steps.text: Prioritize demands so that key customers are satisfied first, or use fair-share techniques with our supply planning engine to spread out supply more evenly.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of prioritized demands

steps.text: Use one of many available Fiori apps to review supply elements such as planned orders, purchase requisitions, and purchase orders.

content.imgAltText: Screenshot of Fiori app for reviewing supply elements
